dialog-bender-glitched.name: %Bender%
messages:
I speak binary fluently, kid! A little
trick like this won't slow me down!

dialog-bender-start1.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Oh! You look friendly!

dialog-bender-start1.name: %Bender%
messages: Well, I'm not!

dialog-bender-start2.name: %Bender%
messages:
Aww, man... I forgot! Someone bit my shiny
metal ass!

Why would someone do such a horrible thing
to an innocent robot?!

Life's not the same without my ass! How
else am I supposed to taunt everyone
stupid-looking?

dialog-bender-start3a.name: %Bender%
messages:
Hey, you, kid! You're the one with the
magic whatsit!

Can't you fix this with your whatever
powers?

I'll give you a great reward! Just get my
ass back!

dialog-bender-start3b.name: %Bender%
messages:
Hey, you, strangely-handsome-looking kid!
You're the one with the magic whatsit!

Can't you fix this with your whatever
powers?

I'll give you a great reward! Just get my
ass back!

dialog-bender-eval-bad.name: %Bender%
messages:
Come on! That doesn't look anything like
me, half-assed or full-assed.

dialog-bender-start-s.name: %Bender%
messages: ...Oh, right. My ass. Someone bit it off.

So what's the holdup? I know you can fix
it!
I'll reward you! Just hurry it up!

dialog-bender-end1.name: %Bender%
messages: Hey, you did it! My ass is back!

dialog-bender-end2.name: %Bender%
messages: Hee hee hee!
Hey, everyone! Bender's ass is back!

dialog-bender-end2.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Well?

dialog-bender-end2.name: %Bender%
messages: Well, what?

dialog-bender-end2.name: %PLAYER%
messages: You said you'd give me a reward!

dialog-bender-end2.name: %Bender%
messages:
I did! You got a front row seat to me,
Bender, showing off my shiny metal ass!
That's the greatest reward there is!

dialog-bender-end2.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
I don't know why I assumed you'd be
friendly.

dialog-bender-end2.name: %Bender%
messages:
Well, you know what they say about
assumptions.

They make a shiny ass... and they give it
to me, Bender.

dialog-bender-comedian.name: %Bender%
messages:
Yeah, yeah, you're a real comedian, kid.
Now turn me back!

dialog-bender-meatbag.name: %Bender%
messages:
Hey, you! Bite my --
Ahhh!

Aaaargh, this is terrible! My ass is even
more missing than before!

First someone bit it off, and now it's an
entirely different kind of ass!
I feel like this is your fault somehow!
Hurry up and fix it, kid!

dialog-bender-end-surprise1.name: %Bender%
messages: Hey, my ass! It's back!

dialog-bender-end-surprise2.name: %Bender%
messages: Hee hee hee!
Hey, everyone! Bender's ass is back!

Don't look so smug, kid. It had nothing to
do with you.
I'm sure my ass came home on its own!

dialog-bender-satisfied.name: %Bender%
messages: Ooh, yeah!

dialog-bender-satisfied.name: %PLAYER%
messages: It's shiny. I'll give you that.
